title: Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt worked as a sales assistant at Cotton On
text:
He has faced accusations of being a 'secret actor' after his IMDb profile surfaced, revealing he is looking for 'lead roles' in films and TV shows.

And it turns out Carlin Sterritt has more secrets from his past, with newly-discovered photos showing that he worked in retail as recently as two years ago.

The 30-year-old, who is billed as a personal trainer on The Bachelorette, was pictured with colleagues at a Cotton On store in Sydney in 2017.

From retail to reality TV! Photos have surfaced of The Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt (back row, second from left) working as a Cotton On sales assistant two years before finding fame

In one of the resurfaced photos, Carlin flashes the peace sign with a lanyard around his neck as he poses with eight of his colleagues.

In addition to being a trainer and former sales assistant, The Bachelorette front-runner is also an aspiring actor.

His IMDb profile recently emerged, with the website describing him as an 'Australian actor auditioning for leading roles around the world'.

Proof he's only on The Bachelorette for fame? In addition to being a trainer and former sales assistant, Carlin is also an aspiring actor

He has modelled for various brands and recently appeared in a television commercial for Wollongong menswear shop, Tramps the Store.

His most recent acting role was in Australian film Out of the Woods, which is listed as being 'in post-production'.

In the past, Carlin has starred in several short films, including Divided (2017), Graveyard Shift (2013) and Red Zone (2013).

Chasing that dream: His IMDb profile recently emerged, with the website describing him as an 'Australian actor auditioning for leading roles around the world'

Carlin made his rivals jealous on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette when he had a 24-hour date with Angie Kent.

During the date, he confessed that he is still legally married to another woman, explaining they are separated but the divorce hasn't yet been finalised.

The identity of Carlin's estranged wife was later revealed to be Taran Higgins, a real estate clerk currently living in New Zealand.

Bombshell! Carlin made his rivals jealous on Thursday night's episode of The Bachelorette when he had a 24-hour date with Angie Kent (right). During the date, he confessed that he is still legally married to another woman
description: The 30-year-old, who is billed as a personal trainer on The Bachelorette, was pictured with colleagues at a Cotton On store in Sydney in 2017
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
